subject: For the "pure EVP" enthusiast
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Such as those that think real EVP can only be received using white noise
might want to do some real research starting with natural radio and what are
call spherics and whistlers, or pulses generated by lightening and other
"natural" EMF sources. Some,  will no doubt claim their system operates at
such a high frequency that it can not get the low frequency EMFs of natural
radio--wrong again. This stuff covers the whole the spectrum from DC to
light, and those little whispers are mostly just RF noise from natural and
man made sources, you can even get the noise from big planets, here on
Earth, from Jupiter and Saturn.  Get a sound  that might seem like singing
and I am pretty sure it's just what is called a "whistler", probably from
terrestrial lightening. The thunderstorm can be anywhere, this stuff
propagates just like radio, and there are hundreds of thunderstorms all over
the planet at any given moment.  Everytime an electric motor starts, or a
florescent light, or a car starts, anything that uses electricity, there is
going to be a magnetic field radiated.  How many electric lights are in the
world going on and off!?  How about in a factory, large shop, lab, or
manufacturing/research facility?Lots and lots of magnetic/electric pulses.

 Then, to make it worse, people claim be touched during investigations might
want to investigate static electricity!  Clothes generate electric fields as
we move around, normally it goes unnoticed, but moving around in the dark
listening and feeling for anything, you might think you're being touched, or
your clothes moved. Could it be just the static electricity causing
attraction and/or repulsion of areas of clothing?  I'm not saying that's
what *it is*. Just be sure, and to get the pure experience, I think all
ghost investigations should be done naked to eliminate all static
electricity from clothing. :-O

 I know, sounds like debunking, but ya have to stop and think sometimes.
Some of these effects we feel and hear can be caused by natural magnetic and
electric sources. Then, make it worse cuz we can create, via thought forms,
just what we want to experience. One must control one's emotions!

 There are some that have established themselves as experts based on white
noise EVP. To maintain position they may claim only white noise EVP is
acceptable and pure.  What is white noise? A frikkin' raw audio in it's
simplest form, so why not use higher level sounds and get higher level
voices? When you get voices giving names, answering questions, and even
cussing and swearing, I am pretty sure "the box" as it's come to be known
beats the be-geeesies out of white noise BS. Yes, you can get broadcast
fragments, and bits that can be mistaken, but with white noise, you can get
all kinds of weak noise pulses that probably say nothing, but you are
desperately trying to interpret. It's been my experience that the more one
filters and cleans a recording, the more these noises sound intelligible. If
you have to filter it just to hear if it is saying anything--forget about
it!  I think our own minds and psi ability--can--- influence the sounds and
create a meaning where there was none.

 Spirit exists in a higher dimension, as such they have full access to our
level and can easily manipulate sound and everything else. We are limited,
they are not. That's why I focus on higher level, more energetic phenomenon
and ignore stuff like white noise EVP or orbs. Paranormal experience is more
dictated by what one can accept than anything else,  by what one fears as
well.


 Wait for it! Wait for it! Here it comes-- the threats of law suits and how
dare you question......

 Am I an expert--hell no, ex===has been, 'spert==drip under pressure. I
don't want to be a "paranormal expert"
